name: Dahlia
title: Ode and Oblation
description: Deacon of the Church of Favonius and the Anemo Archon's representative in the church.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Time for a fun little trick! Summons the Sacramental Shower in different ways depending on whether you Tap or Hold it.
description.3: After a short prayer, summons the Sacramental Shower in front.
description.6: Engages in continuous prayer, and when done, summons forth a Sacramental Shower in the designated position.
description.9: When opponents or nearby party members touch the Sacramental Shower, different effects will occur depending on the one who touches it:
description.10: If an opponent touches the Shower, it will explode and deal <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro> to nearby opponents.
description.11: If a nearby party member touches it, it will bounce the one who touches it high in the air.
description.13: Only 1 Sacramental Shower summoned by Dahlia himself can be on the field at once.

description.0: Appeals to the divine with earnestness and song, dealing <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro> to nearby opponents and granting his party members Favonian Favor, summoning a Shield of Sacred Favor.
description.1: The Shield of Sacred Favor's DMG absorption is based on Dahlia's Max HP, and it will absorb <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro> with 250% effectiveness.
description.4: While this effect is active, 1 Benison stack may be consumed to summon a new Shield of Sacred Favor when an existing Shield is broken via DMG.
description.6: Dahlia can obtain Benison via the following methods:
7: He will gain 1 Benison stack when his own active party member hits opponents 4 times with Normal Attacks while affected by Favonian Favor.
After triggering the effect of his Passive Talent, "The Wind's Gentle Grace" (You must first unlock this Passive Talent.)
description.8: Dahlia can gain a maximum of 4 Benison stacks per Favonian Favor duration.

skillParams.1: Shield of Sacred Favor DMG Absorption

description.0: When characters affected by the Favonian Favor effect of the Elemental Burst Radiant Psalter trigger Frozen reactions on opponents, they will grant Dahlia 2 Benison stacks. This effect can trigger once every 8s.

When your active party member is affected by the Favonian Favor effect of the Elemental Burst "Radiant Psalter," their ATK SPD will increase based on Dahlia's Max HP: Every 1,000 Max HP will cause an increase of 0.5%, up to a maximum of 20%.
During the day (06:00 â€“ 18:00), your party members gain the Swift Stride effect: Movement SPD increased by 10%.
description.1: Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or the Spiral Abyss. Swift Stride does not stack.

description.0: Each time Dahlia gains 1 of his Elemental Burst Radiant Psalter's Benison stacks, he will regain 2.5 Elemental Energy.
After Dahlia consumes his Elemental Burst Radiant Psalter's Benison stacks to summon a Shield of Sacred Favor, the character protected by said Shield will gain 25% increased Shield Strength for 12s.
Increases the Level of Radiant Psalter by 3.
The Favonian Favor from Dahlia's Elemental Burst Radiant Psalter lasts 3 more seconds.
Increases the Level of Immersive Ordinance by 3.
